thread.title: Loans: Portal for Students Seeking Loans
thread.title_full: Loans: Portal for Students Seeking Loans

author: Moneylife Digital Team
title: Loans: Portal for Students Seeking Loans
text: The government has a launched a website , for students seeking educational loans, and five banks, including State Bank of India (SBI), IDBI Bank and Bank of India (BoI), have integrated their system with the portal. “Vidya Lakshmi was launched on the occasion of Independence Day… for the benefit of students seeking educational loans,” a finance ministry release said. The portal has been developed and maintained by NSDL e-Governance Infrastructure Limited (NSDL e-Gov) under the guidance of department of financial services in the finance ministry, department of higher education, ministry of human resource development and Indian Banks Association (IBA). More in Moneylife
